mapper.sql: T.TABLE_NAME AS "tableName", T.COLUMN_NAME AS "columnName", T.DATA_TYPE AS "dataType", T.DATA_LENGTH AS "dataLength", T.DATA_PRECISION AS "dataPrecision", T.DATA_SCALE AS "dataScale", T.NULLABLE AS "nullable", T.COLUMN_ID AS "columnId", T.NUM_DISTINCT AS "numDistinct", T.DENSITY AS "density", T.NUM_NULLS AS "numNulls", T.NUM_BUCKETS AS "numBuckets", T.AVG_COL_LEN AS "avgColLen", T.CHAR_LENGTH AS "charLength", T.CHAR_USED AS "charUsed", CC.COMMENTS AS "comments"

sql.where:
1=1
AND T.TABLE_NAME LIKE '%'||#{tableName}||'%'
AND T.COLUMN_NAME LIKE '%'||#{columnName}||'%'
AND T.DATA_TYPE LIKE '%'||#{dataType}||'%'
AND T.NULLABLE LIKE '%'||#{nullable}||'%'
AND CC.COMMENTS LIKE '%'||#{comments}||'%'

mapper.sql: LEFT JOIN USER_COL_COMMENTS CC ON T.TABLE_NAME=CC.TABLE_NAME AND T.COLUMN_NAME=CC.COLUMN_NAME
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(1) total FROM USER_TAB_COLUMNS T
